item.title: Canine Photography Session
item.description: Today morning I went to a canine photography session organised by safra content creators club. It was held in an open area. First such place I've seen. It's an open area near Alexandra Park. ~20 min walk from nearest bus stop though. Unfortunately during the shoot, light was too harsh. Sun was high and no clouds in the sky. That made the colors dull in photos. But today I got convinced dogs can actually smile !! [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1521.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1521.jpg) ``` ISO160 | f/4.0 | 1/1000sec | 65mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1653.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1653.jpg) ``` ISO320 | f/4.0 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1813.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1813.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1854.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1854.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1858.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1858.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1883.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1883.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 24mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1964.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1964.jpg) ``` ISO320 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1982.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A1982.jpg) ``` ISO500 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A2249.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A2249.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/3200sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A2417.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-17-Canine-Photography-Session/1J7A2417.jpg) ``` ISO400 | f/2.8 | 1/3200sec | 50mm ``` ---

item.title: Southern Ridges Walk
item.description: Today (Sunday), I joined my friend's weekend hiking group to go for a walk in Southern Ridges. I remember doing this route sometime back, but couldn't find any record. We started around 8am. Got caught in a light rain somewhere in the middle, for about 20 min. The scenery was green with occasional glimpses of buildings. The weather was humid (today it's more humid than Singapore usual), and we were drenched with sweat. We walked for about 10 km, and finished the walk around 11am. The lunch was at a food court in Buona-Vista. In the food court, there's a famous chicken rice stall with a long queue. Queue was too long for me, so I had some fried chicken rice from another stall, and took a bus home. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07175.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07175.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/5.6 | 1/1000sec | 50mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07191.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07191.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/400sec | 38mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07201.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07201.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/200sec | 50mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07216.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07216.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/200sec | 16mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07243.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07243.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/400sec | 43mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07255.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07255.jpg) ``` ISO1250 | f/4.0 | 1/60sec | 16mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07258.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07258.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/400sec | 16mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07269.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07269.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.0 | 1/200sec | 31mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07280.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07280.jpg) ``` ISO800 | f/22.0 | 1/100sec | 19mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07289.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-06-09-Southern-Ridges-Walk/DSC07289.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/3.5 | 1/100sec | 16mm ``` ---

item.title: Well of Death
item.description: "Well of Death". Stuntmen performing inside the structure and spectators are watching from the top. Shot at Wattarama Temple, Sri Lanka during the Vesak festival 2024. To be clear this has nothing to do with Vesak but a common occurrence (among other festivities) during each Vesak season in this temple (Since my childhood days). [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06512.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06512.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/500sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06534.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06534.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/500sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06681.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06681.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06769.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06769.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06835.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06835.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06868.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06868.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06954.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC06954.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/160sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC07020.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC07020.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC07035.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC07035.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC07037.jpg)](/assets/camera/2024-05-25-Well-of-Death/DSC07037.jpg) ``` ISO3200 | f/1.8 | 1/800sec | 35mm ``` ---

item.title: Lake Round Kurunegala On A Rainy Day
item.description: It was raining since I landed in Sri Lanka. I landed on Friday and today is Monday. (Only Saturday morning it didn't rain) So decided to go out today even it is raining (wanted to meet a friend too). Colors were bland for most of the shots due to dark weather, so monochrome it is. item.title: Waacking Portraits
item.description: Capturing a dance in a single frame is impossible. But it should be possible to capture at least a part of the dance, may be a movement and the dancer's emotion? Following are the results of my attempt on this. The event is a Waacking (a dance) competition in Singapore. Competition organizer was kind enough to invite me as a photographer. I used a slow shutter speed to capture the movement and did a close crop to isolate the dancer's face. Then converted the photos to monochrome to draw the attention to the emotions and movement. The most challenging part of this is, capturing the movement and get an eye-pleasing image. To do that some part of the image (ideally the face/eyes) need to be sharp while other parts are blurred. item.title: SGP vs THA FIFA2026 Qualifiers
item.description: Shooting a game from pitch side. This time, I felt like an amature. I didn't bring a portable stool, nor mono-pod and my lens is not long enough (but with my 70-200mm I was still able to cover a half of the court). And I was among the few who brought only one camera. But it was a great experience (and photos came out not so bad either). [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-11-21-SGP-vs-THA-FIFA2026-Qualifiers/1J7A0188.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-11-21-SGP-vs-THA-FIFA2026-Qualifiers/1J7A0188.jpg) ``` ISO2000 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 200mm item.title: Pesta Sukan Athletics
item.description: This time it was Athletics in Pesta Sukan 2023. I signed up for 5-10pm shift. Hoping to avoid the heat. Unfortunately the events ended at 5:30pm. So didn't get a much chance to shoot. Only caught the final jump of the high jump (by [Michelle Sng)[https://www.instagram.com/michsng/] and 20x200 event. Michelle Sng, She holds the Singapore National record for Female High Jump. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A6883.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A6883.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/4.0 | 1/2000sec | 89mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A6893.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A6893.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/4.0 | 1/2000sec | 89mm ``` --- Just before the flag-off of 20x200m. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A7030.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A7030.jpg) ``` ISO160 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 158mm ``` --- 20x200m flag-off. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A7091.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-08-05-Pesta-Sukan-Athletics/1J7A7091.jpg) ``` ISO160 | f/3.2 | 1/2000sec | 135mm ``` --- 20x200m flag-off. But it's not properly in sync with the runner. item.title: Pesta Sukan Beach_Volley_Ball
item.description: After attending the Canon creators event on the morning, went to shoot another Pesta Sukan event. It was at AMK Beach Volley Ball court. (It's not a real beach) Though the venue is very hot, even to Singapore standards, met few real cool people there. I think it's the hottest photoshoot I've ever done. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A4810.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A4810.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 115mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5343.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5343.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/3.2 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5421.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5421.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5631.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5631.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/800sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5826.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5826.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/800sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5898.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A5898.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/800sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A6146.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A6146.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/4.0 | 1/1600sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A6305.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A6305.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/3.5 | 1/2000sec | 168mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A6457.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-07-30-Pesta-Sukan-Beach_Volley_Ball/1J7A6457.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` ---

item.title: Ella Odyssey Trip Day 4
item.description: Woke up for the 4th and final day of the trip. All in all it was a good trip. (The view was still great) Sunrise photo 1. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1501.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1501.jpg) ``` ISO500 | f/3.2 | 1/400sec | 70mm ``` --- Sunrise photo 2. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1615.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1615.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 70mm ``` --- Sunrise photo 3. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1616.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1616.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 177mm ``` --- Sunrise photo 4. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1632.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1632.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/4.5 | 1/400sec | 200mm ``` --- After the breakfast, We came to Haputhale railway station to catch the return train. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1697.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1697.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/9.0 | 1/320sec | 70mm ``` --- It's rainy day. (Thankfully it didn't rain on previous three days). Mist was doing its magic. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1762.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1762.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/5.0 | 1/1000sec | 158mm ``` --- Misty rail-road. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1798.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1798.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 70mm ``` --- Train passing the summit level of railway line. (1898.1 Meters above sea level) [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1841.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1841.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/3.5 | 1/1000sec | 75mm ``` --- Mist covered railway bridge. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1945.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1945.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/3.5 | 1/1000sec | 70mm ``` --- Waterfall seen from the train. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1968.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A1968.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 70mm ``` --- Train crossing a bridge. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A2014.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-25-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-4/1J7A2014.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 24mm ``` ---

item.title: Ella Odyssey Trip Day 3
item.description: Woke up for the day 3. To be greeted by this view. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0590.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0590.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/3.2 | 1/200sec | 147mm ``` --- A bit later. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0598.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0598.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/200sec | 70mm ``` --- Then went to visit Morning Hortan Plains. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0626.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0626.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/200sec | 70mm ``` --- Herd of stags. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0640.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0640.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/200sec | 200mm ``` --- Misty mountains. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0698.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0698.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/7.1 | 1/100sec | 70mm ``` --- Bird perching on a tree. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0706.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0706.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/100sec | 200mm ``` --- Bird taking off from a tree. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0726-2.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0726-2.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.0 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Bird perching on grass. Thinking about taking off? [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0766.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0766.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/250sec | 70mm ``` --- Water stream. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0774.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0774.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/250sec | 45mm ``` --- Layers of green mountains. Hortan Plains is one of best kept nature parks in Sri Lanka. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0802-2.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0802-2.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/8.0 | 1/250sec | 67mm ``` --- Water stream flowing through the valey. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0890.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A0890.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/250sec | 45mm ``` --- Baker's Fall. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1041.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1041.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/22.0 | 1/4sec | 50mm ``` --- Mountain seen through the valley. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1261.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1261.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/9.0 | 1/200sec | 24mm ``` --- The road through the Hortan Plains. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1298.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1298.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/8.0 | 1/200sec | 86mm ``` --- Then we came to our final (for the trip) resting place. And witnessed this sunset. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1370.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1370.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/200sec | 70mm ``` --- And this view. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1434.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-24-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-3/1J7A1434.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/7.1 | 1/200sec | 200mm ``` ---

item.title: Ella Odyssey Trip Day 2
item.description: Second day of the odyssey trip. We got up early from the place we stayed at Ella and took an early train to Haputhale. Then we rented two bikes from Haputhale and started the bike part of the journey. Took this when we were passing the Ambewela railway station. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0102.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0102.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/800sec | 158mm ``` --- Two of my friends riding in front of us. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0147.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0147.jpg) ``` ISO800 | f/3.2 | 1/1600sec | 70mm ``` --- All around us were smokey mountains. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0174.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0174.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/3.5 | 1/400sec | 70mm ``` --- We reached Hortan Plains. And this guy was posing. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0243.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0243.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/7.1 | 1/125sec | 200mm ``` --- More wild life. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0250.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0250.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/5.6 | 1/125sec | 70mm ``` --- Wild life with funny pose. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0297.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0297.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/3.2 | 1/640sec | 200mm ``` --- Wild life framed with mist. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0445.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0445.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/6.3 | 1/640sec | 70mm ``` --- Curious. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0473.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0473.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/3.2 | 1/640sec | 200mm ``` --- More smokey mountains. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0547.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0547.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/3.5 | 1/640sec | 70mm ``` --- Attempt to imitate the great Ansel Adams. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0554.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odyssey-Trip-Day-2/1J7A0554.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/640sec | 70mm ``` ---

item.title: Ella Odyssey Trip Day 1
item.description: After months of planing we managed to go on a trip on Ella Odyssey Train. These photos are taken on day 1 of the trip. Train going into a tunnel. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A8911.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A8911.jpg) ``` ISO500 | f/3.2 | 1/1000sec | 89mm ``` --- Train reaching a railway station. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A8978.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A8978.jpg) ``` ISO4000 | f/20.0 | 1/1000sec | 70mm ``` --- Layers of mountains seen from train window. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9153.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9153.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/6.3 | 1/1000sec | 86mm ``` --- Train leaving a railway station. Stations usually have multiple tracks. After passing the station those tracks converges to a single line. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9184.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9184.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/3.5 | 1/1000sec | 70mm ``` --- St. Clair's Falls seen from train. This is one of the widest waterfalls in Sri Lanka and is commonly known as the "Little Niagara of Sri Lanka". [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9210.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9210.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Another beautiful vista. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9358.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9358.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/1000sec | 158mm ``` --- Name board of Great Western railway Station. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9376.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9376.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.5 | 1/1000sec | 70mm ``` --- Ella-Odyssey train stops at Nine-Arch bridge. We got off from the train there. This shot is taken when the train started it's journey again. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9519.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9519.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/14.0 | 1/15sec | 29mm ``` --- Top of the Little Adam's Peak. This is in Ella. We got caught in a rain while climbing. Thankfully I managed to keep the camera dry. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9646.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9646.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/3.2 | 1/200sec | 62mm ``` --- Another shot from top of the Little Adam's Peak. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9679.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9679.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/3.2 | 1/200sec | 70mm ``` --- Ella-Wellawaya road seen from top of the Little Adam's peak. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9741.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9741.jpg) ``` ISO800 | f/3.2 | 1/200sec | 70mm ``` --- We waited at the Little Adam's peak until the sunset. This is a shot of stupa with the sunset in the background. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9755.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-22-Ella-Odessy-Trip-Day-1/1J7A9755.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/200sec | 200mm ``` ---

item.title: Ridiyagama Safari and Hambanthota Bird Park
item.description: Second day of the family trip. After the breakfast and another car fix up we visited the Ridiyagama safari. Where you can travel among free moving animals in a covered vehicle. I liked the way this small deer is lighted up. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8006.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8006.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/3.2 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Fierce looking tiger resting. Guide said they are much more active in the mornings. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8098.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8098.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/3.2 | 1/1000sec | 153mm ``` --- Close up of an elephant's eye. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8234.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8234.jpg) ``` ISO640 | f/3.2 | 1/1000sec | 135mm ``` --- Closeup of an antelope grazing on grass. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8238.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8238.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/3.2 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Then we traveled to Hambanthota Bird park. This is much well-kept compared to the Safari. Two flamingos vibrating the water. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8376.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8376.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/2.8 | 1/800sec | 200mm ``` --- White peacock. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8417.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8417.jpg) ``` ISO400 | f/3.2 | 1/800sec | 200mm ``` --- Blue parrot eating. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8423.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8423.jpg) ``` ISO500 | f/2.8 | 1/800sec | 200mm ``` --- Red parrot, looking at the world outside. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8596.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8596.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Blue parrots playing around. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8635.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8635.jpg) ``` ISO640 | f/3.2 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Sad looking peacock. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8671.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8671.jpg) ``` ISO160 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 142mm ``` --- Caged love birds. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8675.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8675.jpg) ``` ISO5000 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` --- Toco Toucan. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8751.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-17-Ridiyagama-Safari-and-Hambanthota-Bird-Park/1J7A8751.jpg) ``` ISO1250 | f/2.8 | 1/1000sec | 200mm ``` ---

item.title: Down South
item.description: It was a family trip. We reached Galle on sa Friday night. Place we stayed the night got a sea view. Took this shot from the balcony of the room in the morning. Fishermen coming ashore in the morning. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7125.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7125.jpg) ``` ISO160 | f/16.0 | 1/100sec | 200mm ``` --- Again from the hotel room balcony. Couple (and their photographer) decided to do a photoshoot in the morning beach. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7248.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7248.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/250sec | 200mm ``` --- Then we traveled to Galle fort. Galle fort lighthouse seen from the beach. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7403.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7403.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/7.1 | 1/400sec | 70mm ``` --- I just liked the blueness of the scene. Beach near the Galle fort. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7422.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7422.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/7.1 | 1/320sec | 70mm ``` --- Again from the beach near the Galle fort. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7450.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7450.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` --- Galle fort lighthouse from another angle. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7471.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7471.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/3.5 | 1/2000sec | 119mm ``` --- Bunch of girls doing yoga on top of Galle fort with a curious dog. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7542.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7542.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/4.0 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- After fixing two sensors in the car we were traveling to resting place for second night. And stopped to shoot this boats docked near Weligama Bay [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7791.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7791.jpg) ``` ISO400 | f/5.0 | 1/500sec | 200mm ``` --- Weligama pier. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7848.jpg)](/assets/camera/2023-06-16-Down-South/1J7A7848.jpg) ``` ISO800 | f/3.2 | 1/500sec | 70mm ``` ---

item.title: Sengkang Cricket League Premier Final 2022
item.description: Friend invited me to shoot a cricket match. Saturday early morning with a rainy yesterday. Ground was bit muddy. And sun comes from the right side of the pitch. So early shots are from right side of the ground directly in line with the batsman. Later took some shots from behind the batsman to capture expressions of the bowlers. Then towards the end, from behind the bowlers. The conclusion is 70-200mm lens is not the optimal and moving around the ground is not ideal. Much better scenario would be 4 200mm+ lenses on left, right, behind and front of the pitch. Then it would be possible to cover most of the shots. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4057.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4057.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4126.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4126.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4443.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4443.jpg) ``` ISO160 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4529.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4529.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4595.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A4595.jpg) ``` ISO250 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A5298.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A5298.jpg) ``` ISO200 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A5747.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-12-Sengkang-Cricket-League-Premier-Final-2022/1J7A5747.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 200mm ``` ---

item.title: Labrador to Harbourfront Photo Walk
item.description: First photo walk in the November. Rainy day. Was quite a challenge to wake up in the morning. Only two others show up for the walk. Didn't meet many people nor birds during. Had a long discussion about jobs and life, while drinking a chocolate with marshmallow at the end of the walk. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-11-05-Labrador-to-Harbourfront-Photo-Walk/1J7A3499.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-11-05-Labrador-to-Harbourfront-Photo-Walk/1J7A3499.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/11.0 | 1/200sec item.title: Trip to Riverston
item.description: This time it's a trip to Riverston. Located in Matale, Sri Lanka. 3+ hours drive from home and last 20km road is pretty bad. It was super misty. Couldn't see the sun at all. Wasn't much people around either. But thankfully it didn't rain and was able to took some misty photos. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-10-22-Trip-to-Riverston/1J7A2234.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-10-22-Trip-to-Riverston/1J7A2234.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/2.8 | 1/2000sec | 70mm ``` Lone stupa on a rock, near Polgahawela Srilanka. item.title: Yapahuwa
item.description: Yapahuwa was one of the ephemeral capitals of medieval Sri Lanka. The citadel of Yapahuwa was built around a huge granite rock rising abruptly almost a hundred meters above the surrounding lowlands[1]. In 1272, King Bhuvenakabahu transferred the capital from Polonnaruwa to Yapahuwa in the face of Dravidian invasions from South India, bringing the Sacred Tooth Relic with him. Following the death of King Bhuvenakabahu in 1284, the Pandyans of South India invaded Sri Lanka once again, and succeeded in capturing Sacred Tooth Relic. Following its capture, Yapahuwa was largely abandoned and inhabited by Buddhist monks and religious ascetics[1]. And I really missed a having a wide angle lens here. [1]. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yapahuwa [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-10-16-Yapahuwa/1J7A1551.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-10-16-Yapahuwa/1J7A1551.jpg) ``` ISO125 | f/3.2 | 1/2000sec | 200mm item.title: Coney Island Photo Walk
item.description: Late evening visit to Coney Island. Took the metro to Punggol and bus from there. Target was to shoot birds. But as it happens was too early. item.title: National Gallery Photo Walk
item.description: Another photo walk to the National Gallery of Singapore. At the time they were holding a exhibition of first people in Australia. We also got a tour around the gallery from the official of the National Gallery. item.title: ECP Rainy Evening
item.description: Was trying to take long exposures in the East Coast Park. But it was rainy and moody. Can't even distiguish between see and sky. Not a good day to shoot scenes. [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9610.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9610.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/32.0 | 3/5sec | 70mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9644.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9644.jpg) ``` ISO500 | f/2.8 | 1/800sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9671.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9671.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/32.0 | 8/5sec | 158mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9676.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9676.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/32.0 | 2sec | 158mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9689.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9689.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/32.0 | 16/5sec | 104mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9691.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9691.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/14.0 | 2sec | 200mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9694.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9694.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/11.0 | 2sec | 177mm ``` --- [![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9705.jpg)](/assets/camera/2022-09-18-ECP-Rainy-Evening/1J7A9705.jpg) ``` ISO100 | f/8.0 | 5sec | 70mm ``` ---

item.title: C2C Bike Ride
item.description: There is a trail in Singapore called [Coast to Coast(C2C) trail](https://www.nparks.gov.sg/gardens-parks-and-nature/parks-and-nature-reserves/coast-to-coast). I went on it by bike. I was not using the GPS in the phone and relying on a pdf map. (I am trying to cut down the dependency on the mobile phone for some time now) By the time I was little bit farther than the mid point(Macritchie Reservoir), I have already travelled past 40km. Total distance of the trail is 36km. Which tells lot about my map reading skills. And it was around 4 pm already, So I turned back and came home. ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-24-C2C-Bike-Ride/DSC03025.jpeg) ``` E PZ 16-50mm F3.5-5.6 OSS | f/8.0 | 1/60sec | 16mm ``` --- item.title: Coney Island Again
item.description: This time went on a evening bike ride via North Eastern Riverline Loop with a friend and my zoom lens. We took a little detour and went through Coney Island. Spent more time on Coney Island than we thought and had to hurry to complete the tour before dark. So didn't take any photos after the Coney Island. Also the light level is pretty bad this evening. ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02616.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/22.0 | 1/160sec | 96mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02624.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02627.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02642.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/7.1 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02678.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/7.1 | 1/200sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02682.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/7.1 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02697.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/7.1 | 1/250sec | 145mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02742.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/7.1 | 1/320sec | 164mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-10-10-Coney-Island-Again/DSC02761.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/7.1 | 1/250sec | 210mm ``` ---

item.title: Pungol Park at Night
item.description: After trying to capture the full moon since the Poya day, finally succeeded on 2 days after the full moon. Sky was heavy with clouds at the beginning. But Thankfully (with contrast to previous dates) there was a clean sky around midnight. Shots are taken by Punggol park pond. ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC01753.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/22.0 | 13sec | 55mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC01756.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/10.0 | 1/2sec | 55mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC01757.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/22.0 | 4/5sec | 55mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC01760.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/22.0 | 13/10sec | 55mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC01833.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/11.0 | 1/100sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC01915.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/4.5 | 1/100sec | 55mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-08-06-Pungol-Park-at-Night/DSC02084.jpeg) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/11.0 | 1/100sec | 210mm ``` ---

item.title: Morning in the Pungol Park
item.description: Went for a walk in the park in the morning with plans to shoot some birds. Unfortunately most of the bird shots are out of focus. The reason being it's difficulty of getting the auto focus to work on birds due to obstacals(branches, twigs, leaves, etc..) in line of site. When tried with manual focus, bird usually flies away before getting it locked. :( ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01351.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01387.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/320sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01403.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01426.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01500.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01515.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/320sec | 184mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-21-Morning-in-the-Pungol-Park/DSC01531.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/5.6 | 1/400sec | 117mm ``` ---

item.title: Coney Island
item.description: Initial plan was to ride the bicycle to Coney Island. But rent was 8$ per hour. So decided to go by bus as fast as possible and walk the rest. Ended up walking about 2km. In the island there wasn't much to see. May be because of the route we chose. Only met few birds and butterflies from animal department. Also the island was full of one kind of a tree. ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01122.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/9.0 | 1/200sec | 187mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01177.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/9.0 | 1/320sec | 202mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01209.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01221.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01232.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01244.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` --- ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2020-03-14-Coney-Island/DSC01287.JPG) ``` E 55-210mm F4.5-6.3 OSS | f/6.3 | 1/400sec | 210mm ``` ---

item.title: Evening Walk to Singapore Botanic Gardens
item.description: Walk to Botanic Gardens. Unfortunately it got dark soon after I got there. Planing to go there again some time in day time. ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2019-07-28-Evening-Walk-to-Singapore-Botanic-Gardens/0.jpg) ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2019-07-28-Evening-Walk-to-Singapore-Botanic-Gardens/1.jpg) ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2019-07-28-Evening-Walk-to-Singapore-Botanic-Gardens/2.jpg) ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2019-07-28-Evening-Walk-to-Singapore-Botanic-Gardens/3.jpg) ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2019-07-28-Evening-Walk-to-Singapore-Botanic-Gardens/4.jpg) ![camera-photo](/assets/camera/2019-07-28-Evening-Walk-to-Singapore-Botanic-Gardens/5.jpg)
